content.rendered:
Directed by Lauren Iungerich. Eli Gonda. Paula GarcÃ©s. Arlyn Richardson. Joe Suarez.

Written by Lauren Iungerich. Lauren Iungerich. Lauren Iungerich. Jamie Uyeshiro. Jamie Uyeshiro. Jamie Dooner. Eddie Gonzalez. Jeremy Haft. Veronica Rodriguez. Christy Stratton.

Cast Bryana Salaz (Ines). Tenzing Norgay Trainor (Cameron). Ciara Riley Wilson (Demi). Peggy Blow (Marisol Martinez). Michael Solomon (Rusty). J.R. Villarreal (Tio Tonio). Jean Paul San Pedro (Javier). Zaire Adams (Andre). Paula GarcÃ©s (Geny Martinez). Eric Neil Gutierrez (Ruben Martinez). Jami Alix (Cinnamon). Abraham Rodriguez (Benji). Ashley Argota Torres (Davina). Joshua Armando Ticas (Joker). Cyndee Rivera (Lucia). Felice Heather Monteith (Coach Lisa). Innocent Ekakitie (Young Rusty). Christopher W. Jones (Manotaur). Athena Garcia (High School Partier). Carla Jimenez. Marlon Young (Principal Richardson). Eme Ikwuakor (Dwayne Turner). Zuleyka Silver (Valeria). Horacio Abaroa (Tatted Up Dude).

Language English.

Producers David Berke. Jamie Dooner. Eddie Gonzalez. Eric Neil Gutierrez. Jeremy Haft. Lauren Iungerich. Will Rack. Arlyn Richardson. Christy Stratton. Jamie Uyeshiro.

Production Crazy Cat Lady Productions. Netflix Studios.

Creators Lauren Iungerich(co-creator). Jamie Uyeshiro(co-creator). Jamie Dooner.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 8

Status On Going (2023–)
